verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for help; <S%H5833><s%> and stay <S%H8172><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> and trust <S%H982><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are many; <S%H7227><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are very strong; <S%H6105><s%> <S%H3966><s%> but they look <S%H8159><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD! <S%H3068><s%>

Yet he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> is wise, <S%H2450><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> call back <S%H5493><s%> his words: <S%H1697><s%> but will arise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> the help <S%H5833><s%> of them that work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%>

Now the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are men, <S%H120><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> and their horses <S%H5483><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%> When the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall stretch out <S%H5186><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> both he that helpeth <S%H5826><s%> shall fall, <S%H3782><s%> and he that is helped <S%H5826><s%> shall fall down, <S%H5307><s%> and they all <S%H3605><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Like as <S%H834><s%> the lion <S%H738><s%> and the young lion <S%H3715><s%> roaring <S%H1897><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his prey, <S%H2964><s%> when <S%H834><s%> a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> is called forth <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, he will not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H2865><s%> of their voice, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6963><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> abase <S%H6031><s%> himself for the noise <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1995><s%> of them: so <S%H3651><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H6633><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> the hill <S%H1389><s%> thereof.

As birds <S%H6833><s%> flying, <S%H5774><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> defend <S%H1598><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> defending <S%H1598><s%> also he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> it; and passing over <S%H6452><s%> he will preserve <S%H4422><s%> it.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye unto him from whom <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have deeply <S%H6009><s%> revolted. <S%H5627><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> shall cast away <S%H3988><s%> his idols <S%H457><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and his idols <S%H457><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your own hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> unto you for a sin. <S%H2399><s%>

Then shall the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> of a mighty man; <S%H376><s%> and the sword, <S%H2719><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> of a mean man, <S%H120><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> him: but he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and his young men <S%H970><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> discomfited. <S%H4522><s%>

And he shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> to his stronghold <S%H5553><s%> for fear, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4032><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> shall be afraid <S%H2865><s%> of the ensign, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5251><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> fire <S%H217><s%> is in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and his furnace <S%H8574><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
